price: 素莱曼的大军——由精灵、人类、鸟类组成的——被召集到他面前，他们是部署整齐的。
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
